name: Fluffyland
description:
Fluffyland, a 2D MMO where you play as a Flufftizen and explore Fluffyland.

Current Features:

  • Real-time connection between players
  • Chat and friends system
  • Shop and trade system
  • Items and accessories system
  • Data retention on the server with authentication

Credits:

This project uses the free Forest tileset by Kauzz. You can check it out here.
